Pre-Register

What is Preregistration?

We're glad you asked! We believe that teams should be able to solidify their invitational plans as early in the year. It reduces the stress of registration for you and helps plan for your arrival earlier. So, we offer a non-binding way to secure a spot for one team at the 2018 invitational ahead of official registration. Sign up today and rest assured you'll have a spot in a top tier competition!

Pre-Register Your Team

We're so glad that you have decided to join us in February, and securing your spot couldn't be easier! Filling out this form will guarantee you a spot in the 2018 invitational. This is not binding on your part, so if your plans change, simply let us know and we will free your spot. Teams who are interested in reserving space for more than one team will do so You will be notified when official registration opens so that you can confirm your position.

How many teams would you like to register?
